data.title: Basel vs FC Lugano live score, H2H and lineups
data.meta_description: Basel FC Lugano live score (and video online live stream) starts on 27 Jul 2024 at 18:30 UTC time at St. Jakob-Park stadium, Basel city, Switzerland in Super League, Switzerland.
data.text:
On Sofascore livescore you can find all previous Basel vs FC Lugano results sorted by their H2H matches. Sofascore also provides the best way to follow the live score of this game with various sports features. Therefore, you can:

Find out who scored in a live match

Get real-time information on which team is dominating the match using the Attack Momentum

Follow detailed statistics such as ball possession, shots, corner kicks, big chances created, cards, key passes, duels and more

Check all head to head matches – for instance, in the last season Basel and FC Lugano played 3 games against each other

Track all home and away games for each team in the Super League

Check out how Sofascore community votes on which team is more likely to win this match.

All of these features can help you decide on Basel vs. FC Lugano game prediction. Even though Sofascore doesn't offer direct betting, it provides the best odds and shows you which sites offer live betting. Live U-TV odds are viewable on Sofascore's Football live score section.

Where to watch Basel vs. FC Lugano ? Under TV Channels section you can find the list of all channels that broadcast Basel – FC Lugano live match. You can also live stream this match through our betting partners or click on any links on Sofascore for a legal live stream.

Event details:

NAME: Basel - FC Lugano

DATE: 27 Jul 2024

TIME: 18:30 UTC

VENUE: St. Jakob-Park, Basel, Switzerland

Sofascore livescore is available as iPhone and iPad app, Android app on Google Play and Windows phone app. You can find us in all stores on different languages as "Sofascore". Install Sofascore app on and follow Basel FC Lugano live on your mobile!
